title: Nigerians Fear 'Things Are Falling Apart Right Before Their Eyes'
teaser: Five weeks after hundreds of Nigerian school girls were abducted by the extremist group Boko Haram, bomb blasts have hit two cities. Journalist Chika Oduah gives an update on the volatile situation.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
